version_description:
Big update!
In this update we have added more free brushes! And new brushes will appear more often.
We also added new cool Premium brushes and the ability to subscribe. Subscription gives access to all Premium brushes and also disables ads!

And another nice bonus is the “What to draw” function, which will give you a hint to use your imagination if you don’t have any inspiration right now!

And also we fixed small errors :)

Enjoy!

And if suddenly you find any errors - write to us at hello@happymary.ru or use Contact Support button in the app settings.
In this update we fixed some bugs, make the app a little bit later and prepared for the sale!

The big update is here!
We listened to the feedback from our favorite users and subscribers and added so many cool features.

1. Collections of brushes
Curated collections of themed brushes that are perfect for specific purposes.
Now it will be easier for you to choose interesting brushes from our huge catalog! And we will do our best to make a selection of interesting brushes for you as often as possible!

2. Home page
The new start page will show recommendations from our catalog, the last added brushes, quick access to the catalog, the latest collections.

3. Improved directory search.
4. Ads will be shown less often!
5. Faster loading of brushes.
6. Quick check of subscription status.
7. Light theme of the application and its automatic change.
8. Section Resources for our subscribers with palettes, textures and templates.
9. Prepare for the sale!
10. Redesign and a huge number of minor improvements.
New feature! Now you can switch between paid and free brushes. And also some bug fixes and minor UI fixes.
Some bug fixes and ads reduction!

Meet the font catalog! Now in our application you can find fonts to add to Procreate. We improved the speed of downloading files, added a couple of new functions, made edits and fixed bugs.
Did you see a bug or have a suggestion? Write to us at hello@happymary.ru or through the app!
